column4: Hi guys, it's your newbie from hell... I'm trying to copy some tt-fonts over into the fonts folder, but nautilus is telling me that I don't have access there since I'm not the owner. I guess I need root access to that folder. But... since there is no root in Ubuntu, how do I get permission to access/modify files in the fonts folder?
Ok wannes, but where can I find a howto regarding sudo?
google has a lot if you search for sudo howto
